data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @neilbosworth 

We have made a small change to cater for the issue that Tebogo is experiencing every now and then. I have put it in testing for now and will check after a week again.

If we do get the issue again... Gordon/ Anthony must gather information from Tebogo of her work environment at the time of the issue.

    * Is she working with 2 open screens
    * was she working with an old session without logging out
    * does she copy her browser URL to another screen
    * etc



We need to understand how its only Tebogo that gets these issues.
There must be something that she is doing to experience the issues.
